full_threads.body:
Great thanks Rica!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy,

I've checked both the AU and Global sites. Yes, there pages that are not reflecting the changes we've made. The global sites are all showing the updates and I made sure that the changes is now showing on the AU sites.

Here are the pages that we fixed:
Full Colour 12mm&24mm panels:
https://acoufelt.com/au/product/colourways/
Desk solutions:
https://acoufelt.com/au/open-office-solutions/
Mobile acoustics:
https://acoufelt.com/au/product/table-solutions-u-divider/
https://acoufelt.com/au/product/table-solutions-l-divider/

AU Site
Full Colour 12mm&24mm panels:
https://acoufelt.com/au/product/colourways/
Desk solutions:
https://acoufelt.com/au/open-office-solutions/
Mobile acoustics:
https://acoufelt.com/au/product/table-solutions-u-divider/
https://acoufelt.com/au/product/table-solutions-l-divider/

Rica,

There were problems with the specsheet upload as I outlined in my previous email:

Doesn't seem to be loading for:

12mm & 24mm panels.

Desk solutions

Mobile acoustics

On the AU site at least.

Can you please double check all?

Thanks

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy,

Yes, it was already updated. Let us know if you would like further changes.

Hey Rica,

How is the below going? Have these been updated yet?

Thanks

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy,

Sorry about that. Please disregard, I was not able to find it a while ago but we already updated it.

Rica,

Fracture is here: https://acoufelt.com/product/fracture-chevron-acoustic-panel/

I am confused by what you mean here?

Thanks

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager
